section.title: Section
section.description: Name code of the FAOSTAT website section.

faostat_code.title: FAOSTAT Code
faostat_code.description: Code used in the FAOSTAT codelists.

dimension.title: Dimension
dimension.description: Object representing a single dimension of a FAOSTAT dataset.

parameter.title: Procedure Parameter
parameter.description: Name of the procedure's parameter mapped to this dimenison.

service.title: Service
service.description: Relative link to the service capable to provide codes for the current dimension.

whitelist.title: Whitelist
whitelist.description: List of codes allowed in the output.

blacklist.title: Blacklist
blacklist.description: List of codes not allowed in the output.

coding_system.title: Coding System
coding_system.description: Alternate coding system applied to a dimension

pivot.title: Pivot
pivot.description: Used to retrieve the pivot configuration on the requested data

filter_list.title: Filter List
filter_list.description: Index of the dimension to be used as filter.

links.title: Data
links.description: Alternative service to fetch FAOSTAT data through the use of a configuration bean.

decimal_places.title: Decimal Places
decimal_places.description: Number of decimal places for the values of the output.

.{1,}.title: Filter
.{1,}.description: Definition of a filter for the data.

null_values.title: Null Values
null_values.description: Flag to determine whether null values will be shown or not.

group_by.title: Group By
group_by.description: Comma separated string of the dimensions used to group the result of the query.

order_by.title: Order By
order_by.description: Comma separated string of the dimensions used to order the result of the query.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: Function to aggregate the result of the query.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximium number of rows returned by the query.

page_number.title: Page Number
page_number.description: Number of the page to be retrieved.

show_codes.title: Show Codes
show_codes.description: Flag that determines whether codes are shown or not.

show_flags.title: Show Flags
show_flags.description: Flag that determines whether flags are shown or not.

show_unit.title: Show Units
show_unit.description: Flag that determines whether units are shown or not.

decimal_places.description: Number of decimal places for the values of the output.
